Name: dimethyl sulfoxide production | dimethyl sulfoxide | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: In industry, DMSO is produced by catalytic oxidation of dimethyl sulfide with oxygen or by oxidation with nitrogen dioxide.
